basics.name: Pablo Contreras
basics.label: Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience
basics.summary: Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience, specialized in Full Stack development with Python and JavaScript. Expert in creating technological solutions with Vue, Django, microservices, and AWS, I have successfully developed and led the implementation of ERP systems and fintech platforms, significantly improving operational efficiency and user experience. Skilled in team coordination and motivation, I easily adapt to dynamic and challenging environments, always focused on quality and innovation.

work.name: Destacame
work.summary: Initially hired for frontend tasks, I progressively acquired and applied backend skills with Python and Django, contributing to the development of fintech products in Chile and Mexico. Assigned to process optimization through the automation of manual tasks and the implementation of new technologies such as Vue and Nuxt.
highlights: Contribution to the development of fintech products

work.name: Appinteli
work.summary: I co-founded and developed an ERP for small stores, focusing on inventory, sales, and process automation. Despite not achieving expected success, I gained valuable experience in development, sales, and business management.

work.name: Goodmeal
work.summary: I contributed to the development of a web system for multiple restaurants, leading the development team and facilitating the implementation of advanced technological solutions that improved operational efficiency and customer experience.

work.name: Dibal
work.position: Development Team Leader and Senior Web Developer
work.summary: I developed a web system to monitor production processes and record machine downtime, which allowed the company to improve processes and make data-driven decisions.
highlights: Implementation of security in local network access

work.name: LABORATORIO COFASA, S.A.
work.summary: I led the development and implementation of a project execution control system, designing a network architecture for centralized data access and creating user-friendly interfaces for budget management.
highlights: User interface design and budget management

work.name: Various Development Projects
work.summary: I participated in various development projects over several years, ranging from the development of medical record management systems to inventory and project execution control systems. My roles varied from directly interacting with clients to gather requirements to leading the design and development of systems architectures and user interfaces.
highlights: Development and implementation of a medical records management system for the Ministry of Education 'IPASME'
Implementation and maintenance of an inventory system for CORPOELEC
Leadership in the development of a project execution control system for LABORATORIO COFASA, S.A.

education.institution: Universidad Politécnica Territorial de Yaracuy Arístides Bastidas (UPTYAB)

awards.title: Triple Alliance Challenge Lima
awards.summary: For achieving 1st place in the Commerce sector of the 'Triple Alliance COVID-19 Challenge'

projects.name: ERP for Small Stores
projects.description: Co-founder and developer of an ERP focused on automating inventory, sales, and purchasing processes for small stores.
highlights: Development of an integrated e-commerce platform
Client and project management from scratch
